element.name: TSegment
element.short: Modelizes a straight line joining two points

element.name: TRoute
element.short: Modelizes a path linking two points (the first and the last). Its a compact modelization of a set of segments.
element.descr: A roote should be kept so that none of its segments intersect.

element.name: TArea
element.short: Modelizes a space region as an union of multiple rectangles.
element.descr: An area should always be contiguous and intersection of any two recatngles should be reduced to the common boundary.

element.name: Bounds
element.short: Creates the smallest rectangle containing all the route points.

element.name: RectCenter
element.short: Returns the coordinates of the center point of a rectrangle.

element.name: Intersect
element.short: Returns False if the segments have a null intersection and True otherwise

element.name: Segment
element.short: Returns a segment joining the two points given as arguments

element.name: Intersection
element.short: Returns an area which results from the intersection of a given area with a given rectangle and provides the indexes of the rectangles of the area which intersection with the rectangle given as parameter is non null.
